description: 返回段落中出现频率最高的前三个单词
author: Daily Exercise

test_cases.description: get_words("Coding in Python is fun because coding Python allows for coding in Python easily while coding") should return ["coding", "python", "in"]

input.paragraph: Coding in Python is fun because coding Python allows for coding in Python easily while coding

test_cases.description: get_words("I like coding. I like testing. I love debugging!") should return ["i", "like", "coding"]

input.paragraph: I like coding. I like testing. I love debugging!

test_cases.description: get_words("Debug, test, deploy. Debug, debug, test, deploy. Debug, test, test, deploy!") should return ["debug", "test", "deploy"]

input.paragraph: Debug, test, deploy. Debug, debug, test, deploy. Debug, test, test, deploy!

test_cases.description: get_words("apple, apple, apple! banana banana. cherry") should return ["apple", "banana", "cherry"]

input.paragraph: apple, apple, apple! banana banana. cherry

hints: 考虑使用字典来统计词频
